speaker: President. -
english: President. - The next item is the report by Anne Ferreira, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the Green Paper on market-based instruments for environment and related policy purposes ( 2007/2203(INI) ) ( A6-0040/2008 ).
